subtitle: God did not want Abraham to kill his son
Isaac obviously he wanted to see whether
the love for Isaac was just human love
biological human love of a father to a
son or is it infused with something
Divine which means it's not just on your
terms this is where you turn the human
into the Divine in addition to your
natural love say one second I need to
know what's good for my child not just
what I think is good but also what does
God think is good what's the higher good
maybe my child needs something that I
don't fully understand in the sense it's
like sacrificing your way of looking at
it and seeing the Divine way of looking
at it and that actually transformed the
love of his own son into something
eternal
foreign
